column2: This character has become a Ghazneth, a fell demon who betrayed Cormyr
Dedicated to promoting good, preserving history, and maintaining a balance between nature and civilization
A powerful undead spellcaster often assuming undead form in order to live forever
Teu-tel-quessir are more tolerant of humans than other eladrin and the most common type in Faerûn
An undead creature created from a preserved corpse
A member of the prestigious military order of Purple Dragons in Cormyr
A being who has merged with the essence of shadowstuff
An undead ghostlike form adopted by some former Harpers upon death
The most common type of halfling in Faerûn, comfortable alongside other cultures and willing to adapt
A powerful undead humanoid feeding on the blood of the living
A member of the mercenary company of Zhentil Keep
